sentences: Kui sa rehkendustega ise õigeks ei saa, tule Rajale, küll ma aitan.
Õieti tal polnud ju abi tungivalt vajagi, ta oleks õigeks saanud ka omal jõul.
translation: to manage to deal with something
context: The word 'õigeks' is the illative case form of 'õige' (right/correct), but in this context it's part of the verb phrase 'õigeks saama' which means 'to become well', 'to recover', or 'to get better'. It can also mean to manage to deal with something difficult. The word is commonly used when someone needs time to recover from illness, fatigue, or other challenging situations.
